### Load packages and data

```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(dsbox)
```

```{r load-data, message = FALSE}
states <- read_csv("data/states.csv")
```

### Exercise 1

```{r AK-dennys}
dn_ak <- dennys %>%
  filter(state == "AK")
nrow(dn_ak)
```

There are three Denny's locations in Alaska.


```{r AK-laquinta}
lq_ak <- laquinta %>%
  filter(state == "AK")
nrow(lq_ak)
```

There are two La Quinta locations in Alaska.
